segments.text: I would appreciate it if you could go to the store for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . What do you want me to get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's a list with a few things that I need you to get .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you forget to put anything on the list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think I forgot anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like me to go anywhere else for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don't mind , I would appreciate it if you would pick up my prescription .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Has your prescription been filled yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Someone at the pharmacy called and told me it was ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll go get it for you .
segments.speaker: S2
